entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 27. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
